metadata.title: Flash Mints (T Eric Monroe - Genesis Collection) #1
metadata.description: Introducing T. Eric Monroe's first complete NFT collection: T. Eric Monroe ‘Genesis Collection’, Composed of 2,021 unique NFT editions of T. Eric's photographs (Each NFT is numbered with a serial number proving its authenticity). This collection represents a portion of T. Eric’s private collection of photos that he’s shot from over the years. Each NFT tells a story from T. Eric's perspective about the shot and unlocks exclusive benefits, rewards, and surprises for all NFT holders of this collection.
